get.description: Get a list of deployment targets in a deployment group.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: deploymentGroupId
parameters.description: ID of the deployment group.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Get only the deployment targets that contain all these comma separted list of tags.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name pattern of the deployment targets to return.

parameters.name: partialNameMatch
parameters.description: When set to true, treats **name** as pattern. Else treats it as absolute match. Default is **false**.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Include these additional details in the returned objects.

values.description: Include capabilities of the deployment agent.
Include the job request assigned to the deployment agent.
Include the last completed job request of the deployment agent.

parameters.name: agentStatus
parameters.description: Get only deployment targets that have this status.

values.description: Only deployment targets that are offline.
Only deployment targets that are online.

parameters.name: agentJobResult
parameters.description: Get only deployment targets that have this last job result.

values.description: Only those deployment targets on which last job failed (**Abandoned**, **Canceled**, **Failed**, **Skipped**).
Only those deployment targets on which last job Passed (**Succeeded**, **Succeeded with issues**).
Only those deployment targets that never executed a job.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Get deployment targets with names greater than this continuationToken lexicographically.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Maximum number of deployment targets to return. Default is **1000**.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Get only deployment targets that are enabled or disabled. Default is 'null' which returns all the targets.

poolId.description: Identifier of the deployment pool in which deployment agents are registered.

DeploymentGroupCreateParameterPoolProper.description: Properties of Deployment pool to create Deployment group.

columnsHeader.description: List of deployment group properties. And types of metrics provided for those properties.

rows.description: Values of properties and the metrics. E.g. 1: total count of deployment targets for which 'TargetState' is 'offline'. E.g. 2: Average time of deployment to the deployment targets for which 'LastJobStatus' is 'passed' and 'TargetState' is 'online'.

desiredState.description: Users can force state changes to specific states (ToReimage, ToDelete, Save)

name.description: Computer name. Used to match a scaleset VM with an agent

stateChangedOn.description: Last state change. Only updated by SQL.

_links.description: This field contains zero or more interesting links about the graph subject. These links may be invoked to obtain additional relationships or more detailed information about this graph subject.

descriptor.description: The descriptor is the primary way to reference the graph subject while the system is running. This field will uniquely identify the same graph subject across both Accounts and Organizations.

displayName.description: This is the non-unique display name of the graph subject. To change this field, you must alter its value in the source provider.

url.description: This url is the full route to the source resource of this graph subject.

directoryAlias.description: Deprecated - Can be retrieved by querying the Graph user referenced in the "self" entry of the IdentityRef "_links" dictionary

imageUrl.description: Deprecated - Available in the "avatar" entry of the IdentityRef "_links" dictionary

inactive.description: Deprecated - Can be retrieved by querying the Graph membership state referenced in the "membershipState" entry of the GraphUser "_links" dictionary

isAadIdentity.description: Deprecated - Can be inferred from the subject type of the descriptor (Descriptor.IsAadUserType/Descriptor.IsAadGroupType)

isContainer.description: Deprecated - Can be inferred from the subject type of the descriptor (Descriptor.IsGroupType)

profileUrl.description: Deprecated - not in use in most preexisting implementations of ToIdentityRef

dependencyInputIds.description: The ids of all inputs that the value of this input is dependent on.

description.description: Description of what this input is used for

groupName.description: The group localized name to which this input belongs and can be shown as a header for the container that will include all the inputs in the group.

hasDynamicValueInformation.description: If true, the value information for this input is dynamic and should be fetched when the value of dependency inputs change.

inputMode.description: Mode in which the value of this input should be entered

values.description: This input should not be shown in the UI
An input text box should be shown
An password input box should be shown
A select/combo control should be shown
Checkbox should be shown(for true/false values)
A multi-line text area should be shown

isConfidential.description: Gets whether this input is confidential, such as for a password or application key

name.description: Localized name which can be shown as a label for the subscription input

properties.description: Custom properties for the input which can be used by the service provider

type.description: Underlying data type for the input value. When this value is specified, InputMode, Validation and Values are optional.

useInDefaultDescription.description: Gets whether this input is included in the default generated action description.

validation.description: Information to use to validate this input's value

valueHint.description: A hint for input value. It can be used in the UI as the input placeholder.

values.description: Information about possible values for this input

InputValidation.description: Describes what values are valid for a subscription input

dataType.description: Gets or sets the data type to validate.

values.description: Represents a value of true or false.

isRequired.description: Gets or sets if this is a required field.

maxLength.description: Gets or sets the maximum length of this descriptor.

maxValue.description: Gets or sets the minimum value for this descriptor.

minLength.description: Gets or sets the minimum length of this descriptor.

minValue.description: Gets or sets the minimum value for this descriptor.

pattern.description: Gets or sets the pattern to validate.

patternMismatchErrorMessage.description: Gets or sets the error on pattern mismatch.

patternMismatchWarningMessage.description: Gets or sets the warning on pattern mismatch.

warningPattern.description: Gets or sets the pattern to validate.

context.description: Provides binding context for the expression to evaluate

InputValue.description: Information about a single value for an input

data.description: Any other data about this input

displayValue.description: The text to show for the display of this value

value.description: The value to store for this input

InputValues.description: Information about the possible/allowed values for a given subscription input

defaultValue.description: The default value to use for this input

error.description: Errors encountered while computing dynamic values.

isLimitedToPossibleValues.description: Should the value be restricted to one of the values in the PossibleValues (True) or are the values in PossibleValues just a suggestion (False)

isReadOnly.description: Should this input be made read-only

possibleValues.description: Possible values that this input can take

InputValuesError.description: Error information related to a subscription input value.

Issue.description: An issue (error, warning) associated with a pipeline run.

category.description:
The category of the issue.
Example: Code - refers to compilation errors
Example: General - refers to generic errors

data.description: A dictionary containing details about the issue.

type.description: The type (error, warning) of the issue.

request.description: A pipeline job request for an agent.

agentShuttingDown.description: Indicates whether the agent is in the process of shutting down.

JobEnvironment.description: Represents the context of variables and vectors for a job request.

systemConnection.description: Gets or sets the endpoint used for communicating back to the calling service.

JobEvent.description: A pipeline job event to be processed by the execution plan.

jobId.description: The ID of the pipeline job affected by the event.

name.description: The name of the pipeline job event.

type.description: Gets the node type for this JToken.

message.description: A message to be sent to an agent currently running the job.

JobMetadataMessage.description: A message to be sent to an agent currently running the job.

postLinesFrequencyMillis.description: The agent's frequency of posting lines to the logs console expressed in milliseconds. There are 2 modes: Slow (10 seconds) and Fast (half a second).

JobOption.description: Represents an option that may affect the way an agent runs the job.

id.description: Gets the id of the option.

first.description: Get the first child token of this token.

hasValues.description: Gets a value indicating whether this token has child tokens.

last.description: Get the last child token of this token.

next.description: Gets the next sibling token of this node.

path.description: Gets the path of the JSON token.

previous.description: Gets the previous sibling token of this node.

root.description: Gets the root JToken of this JToken.

type.description: Gets the node type for this JToken.

providerType.description: Provider type (CustomProvider or AzureKubernetesServiceProvider) of the resource to be updated

MarketplacePurchasedLicense.description: Represents a purchase of resource units in a secondary marketplace.

purchaserName.description: The name of the identity making the purchase as seen by the marketplace

MetricsColumnMetaData.description: Meta data for a metrics column.

dimensions.description: Properties of deployment group for which metrics are provided. E.g. 1: LastJobStatus E.g. 2: TargetState

metrics.description: The types of metrics. E.g. 1: total count of deployment targets. E.g. 2: Average time of deployment to the deployment targets.

dimensions.description: The values of the properties mentioned as 'Dimensions' in column header. E.g. 1: For a property 'LastJobStatus' - metrics will be provided for 'passed', 'failed', etc. E.g. 2: For a property 'TargetState' - metrics will be provided for 'online', 'offline' targets.

metrics.description: Metrics in serialized format. Should be deserialized based on the data type provided in header.

createdOn.description: The date the package was created

downloadUrl.description: A direct link to download the package.

filename.description: The UI uses this to display instructions, i.e. "unzip MyAgent.zip"

hashValue.description: MD5 hash as a base64 string

PropertiesCollection.description: The class represents a property bag as a collection of key-value pairs. Values of all primitive types (any type with a `TypeCode != TypeCode.Object`) except for `DBNull` are accepted. Values of type Byte[], Int32, Double, DateType and String preserve their type, other primitives are retuned as a String. Byte[] expected as base64 encoded string.

count.description: The count of properties in the collection.

keys.description: The set of keys in the collection.

values.description: The set of values in the collection.

ReferenceLinks.description: The class to represent a collection of REST reference links.

links.description: The readonly view of the links.  Because Reference links are readonly, we only want to expose them as read only.

ResourceItem.description: Resources include Service Connections, Variable Groups and Secure Files.

createdBy.description: Gets or sets the identity who created the resource.

description.description: Gets or sets description of the resource.

iconUrl.description: Gets or sets icon url of the resource.

id.description: Gets or sets Id of the resource.

isOutdated.description: Indicates whether resource is outdated or not.

isShared.description: Indicates whether resource is shared with other projects or not.

name.description: Gets or sets name of the resource.

properties.description: Gets or sets internal properties of the resource.

ResourceLockRequest.description: A request for a resource's exclusive lock

assignTime.description: The date/time this request was assigned.

branch.description: The branch the lock belongs to. It's used only by RunLatest exclusive locks of persisted stages.

checkRunId.description: The ID of the check run waiting on this request

definitionId.description: The ID of the pipeline that requested this resource

finishTime.description: The date/time this request was finished.

lockType.description: The behavior this request should exhibit in relation to other lock requests

nodeName.description: Name of the graph node (currently stage) requesting this resource

planId.description: Internal ID for the orchestration plan connected with this request.

projectId.description: The ID of the project of the check run and definition exist in

queueTime.description: The date/time this request was queued.

ServiceEndpoint.description: Represents an endpoint which may be used by an orchestration job.

administratorsGroup.description: Gets or sets the identity reference for the administrators group of the service endpoint.

authorization.description: Gets or sets the authorization data for talking to the endpoint.

createdBy.description: Gets or sets the identity reference for the user who created the Service endpoint.

creationDate.description: Gets or sets the date, when the Service endpoint has been created.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of endpoint.

id.description: Gets or sets the identifier of this endpoint.

isShared.description: Indicates whether service endpoint is shared with other projects or not.

modificationDate.description: Gets or sets the date, when the Service endpoint has been modified.

modifiedBy.description: Gets or sets the identity reference for the user who did the latest modification of the Service endpoint.

name.description: Gets or sets the friendly name of the endpoint.

operationStatus.description: Error message during creation/deletion of endpoint

owner.description: Gets or sets the owner of the endpoint.

readersGroup.description: Gets or sets the identity reference for the readers group of the service endpoint.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the endpoint.

url.description: Gets or sets the url of the endpoint.

authorizationHeaders.description: Gets or sets the authorization headers of service endpoint authentication scheme.

clientCertificates.description: Gets or sets the certificates of service endpoint authentication scheme.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name for the service endpoint authentication scheme.

inputDescriptors.description: Gets or sets the input descriptors for the service endpoint authentication scheme.

scheme.description: Gets or sets the scheme for service endpoint authentication.

definition.description: Gets the definition of service endpoint execution owner.

finishTime.description: Gets the finish time of service endpoint execution.

id.description: Gets the Id of service endpoint execution data.

owner.description: Gets the owner of service endpoint execution data.

planType.description: Gets the plan type of service endpoint execution data.

result.description: Gets the result of service endpoint execution.

startTime.description: Gets the start time of service endpoint execution.

data.description: Gets the execution data of service endpoint execution.

endpointId.description: Gets the Id of service endpoint.

ServiceEndpointType.description: Represents type of the service endpoint.

authenticationSchemes.description: Authentication scheme of service endpoint type.

dataSources.description: Data sources of service endpoint type.

dependencyData.description: Dependency data of service endpoint type.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of service endpoint type.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name of service endpoint type.

endpointUrl.description: Gets or sets the endpoint url of service endpoint type.

helpLink.description: Gets or sets the help link of service endpoint type.

iconUrl.description: Gets or sets the icon url of service endpoint type.

inputDescriptors.description: Input descriptor of service endpoint type.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of service endpoint type.

trustedHosts.description: Trusted hosts of a service endpoint type.

uiContributionId.description: Gets or sets the ui contribution id of service endpoint type.

assignedAgentCloudRequest.description: The agent cloud request that's currently associated with this agent.

assignedRequest.description: The request which is currently assigned to this agent.

createdOn.description: Date on which this agent was created.

lastCompletedRequest.description: The last request which was completed by this agent.

maxParallelism.description: Maximum job parallelism allowed for this agent.

statusChangedOn.description: Date on which the last connectivity status change occurred.

systemCapabilities.description: System-defined capabilities supported by this agent's host. Warning: To set capabilities use the PUT method, PUT will completely overwrite existing capabilities.

userCapabilities.description: User-defined capabilities supported by this agent's host. Warning: To set capabilities use the PUT method, PUT will completely overwrite existing capabilities.

TaskAgentAuthorization.description: Provides data necessary for authorizing the agent using OAuth 2.0 authentication flows.

authorizationUrl.description: Endpoint used to obtain access tokens from the configured token service.

publicKey.description: Public key used to verify the identity of this agent.

acquireAgentEndpoint.description: Gets or sets a AcquireAgentEndpoint using which a request can be made to acquire new agent

internal.description: Signifies that this Agent Cloud is internal and should not be user-manageable

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the endpoint.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name of agent cloud type.

inputDescriptors.description: Gets or sets the input descriptors

name.description: Gets or sets the name of agent cloud type.

TaskAgentJobRequest.description: A job request for an agent.

definition.description: The pipeline definition associated with this request

demands.description: A list of demands required to fulfill this request.

hostId.description: The host which triggered this request.

jobId.description: ID of the job resulting from this request.

jobName.description: Name of the job resulting from this request.

lockedUntil.description: The deadline for the agent to renew the lock.

owner.description: The pipeline associated with this request

planId.description: Internal ID for the orchestration plan connected with this request.

planType.description: Internal detail representing the type of orchestration plan.

poolId.description: The ID of the pool this request targets

queueId.description: The ID of the queue this request targets

reservedAgent.description: The agent allocated for this request.

scopeId.description: Scope of the pipeline; matches the project ID.

serviceOwner.description: The service which owns this request.

assignTime.description: The date/time this request was assigned.

finishTime.description: The date/time this request was finished.

queueTime.description: The date/time this request was queued.

receiveTime.description: The date/time this request was receieved by an agent.

TaskAgentMessage.description: Provides a contract for receiving messages from the task orchestrator.

body.description: Gets or sets the body of the message. If the <c>IV</c> property is provided the body will need to be decrypted using the <c>TaskAgentSession.EncryptionKey</c> value in addition to the <c>IV</c>.

iv.description: Gets or sets the initialization vector used to encrypt this message.

messageId.description: Gets or sets the message identifier.

messageType.description: Gets or sets the message type, describing the data contract found in <c>TaskAgentMessage.Body</c>.

agentCloudId.description: The ID of the associated agent cloud.

autoProvision.description: Whether or not a queue should be automatically provisioned for each project collection.

autoSize.description: Whether or not the pool should autosize itself based on the Agent Cloud Provider settings.

autoUpdate.description: Whether or not agents in this pool are allowed to automatically update

createdBy.description: Creator of the pool. The creator of the pool is automatically added into the administrators group for the pool on creation.

createdOn.description: The date/time of the pool creation.

owner.description: Owner or administrator of the pool.

targetSize.description: Target parallelism - Only applies to agent pools that are backed by pool providers. It will be null for regular pools.

maxConcurrentAgentsPercentage.description: Max percentage of agents within a pool running maintenance job at given time

pool.description: Pool reference for the maintenance definition

definitionId.description: The maintenance definition for the maintenance job

errorCount.description: The total error counts during the maintenance job

finishTime.description: Time that the maintenance job was completed

logsDownloadUrl.description: The log download url for the maintenance job

orchestrationId.description: Orchestration/Plan Id for the maintenance job

pool.description: Pool reference for the maintenance job

queueTime.description: Time that the maintenance job was queued

requestedBy.description: The identity that queued the maintenance job

startTime.description: Time that the maintenance job was started

warningCount.description: The total warning counts during the maintenance job

workingDirectoryExpirationInDays.description: time to consider a System.DefaultWorkingDirectory is stale

numberOfHistoryRecordsToKeep.description: Number of records to keep for maintenance job executed with this definition.

daysToBuild.description: Days for a build (flags enum for days of the week)

values.description: Run on all days of the week.

scheduleJobId.description: The Job Id of the Scheduled job that will queue the pool maintenance job.

timeZoneId.description: Time zone of the build schedule (string representation of the time zone id)

isHosted.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not this pool is managed by the service.

isLegacy.description: Determines whether the pool is legacy.

values.description: TaskAgentPool backed by the Elastic pool service
Set to true if agents are re-imaged after each TaskAgentJobRequest
Set to true if agents are held for investigation after a TaskAgentJobRequest failure

poolType.description: Gets or sets the type of the pool

values.description: A typical pool of task agents

size.description: Gets the current size of the pool.

assignedRequestCount.description: Number of requests queued and assigned to an agent. Not running yet.

queuedRequestCount.description: Number of queued requests which are not assigned to any agents

TaskAgentPublicKey.description: Represents the public key portion of an RSA asymmetric key.

exponent.description: Gets or sets the exponent for the public key.

modulus.description: Gets or sets the modulus for the public key.

name.description: Name of the queue

enabled.description: Whether or not this agent should run jobs.

name.description: Name of the agent.

status.description: Whether or not the agent is online.

TaskAgentSession.description: Represents a session for performing message exchanges from an agent.

agent.description: Gets or sets the agent which is the target of the session.

agentCanHandleOaepSHA256.description: This will be false in case an old Agent is creating the session.

encryptionKey.description: Gets the key used to encrypt message traffic for this session.

ownerName.description: Gets or sets the owner name of this session. Generally this will be the machine of origination.

sessionId.description: Gets the unique identifier for this session.

TaskAgentSessionKey.description: Represents a symmetric key used for message-level encryption for communication sent to an agent.

encrypted.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the key value is encrypted. If this value is true, the Value property should be decrypted using the <c>RSA</c> key exchanged with the server during registration.

encryptionPadding.description: Name of RSAEncryptionPadding that TFS (backend) used. New Agents will check this value. Won't be emitted for old Agents that only support OaepSHA1.

value.description: Gets or sets the symmetric key value.

status.description: Whether or not the agent is online.

statusChangedOn.description: Date on which the last connectivity status change occurred.

currentState.description: Current state of this agent update.

requestTime.description: Date on which this update was requested.

sourceVersion.description: Source agent version of the update.

targetVersion.description: Target agent version of the update.

deliveryFailed.description: The api request was no delivered successfully

connectionId.description: An ID that identifies a service connection to be used for authenticating endpoint requests.

keySelector.description: An Json based keyselector to filter response returned by fetching the endpoint Url.A Json based keyselector must be prefixed with "jsonpath:". KeySelector can be used to specify the filter to get the keys for the values specified with Selector. The following keyselector defines an Json for extracting nodes named 'ServiceName'. endpoint.KeySelector = "jsonpath://ServiceName";

scope.description: The scope as understood by Connected Services. Essentially, a project-id for now.

selector.description: An XPath/Json based selector to filter response returned by fetching the endpoint Url. An XPath based selector must be prefixed with the string "xpath:". A Json based selector must be prefixed with "jsonpath:". The following selector defines an XPath for extracting nodes named 'ServiceName'. endpoint.Selector = "xpath://ServiceName";

taskId.description: TaskId that this endpoint belongs to.

definitionType.description: Gets or sets the definition type. Values can be 'task' or 'metaTask'.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of task.

versionSpec.description: Gets or sets the version specification of task.

taskId.description: The ID of the task definition.

execTask.description: The utility task to run.  Specifying this means that this task definition is simply a meta task to call another task. This is useful for tasks that call utility tasks like powershell and commandline

platformInstructions.description: If a task is going to run code, then this provides the type/script etc... information by platform. For example, it might look like. net45: { typeName: "Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Automation.Tasks.PowerShellTask", assemblyName: "Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Automation.Tasks.PowerShell.dll" } net20: { typeName: "Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Automation.Tasks.PowerShellTask", assemblyName: "Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Automation.Tasks.PowerShell.dll" } java: { jar: "powershelltask.tasks.automation.teamfoundation.microsoft.com", } node: { script: "powershellhost.js", }

createdBy.description: Gets or sets the identity who created.

createdOn.description: Gets or sets date on which it got created.

deleted.description: Gets or sets as 'true' to indicate as deleted, 'false' otherwise.

modifiedBy.description: Gets or sets the identity who modified.

modifiedOn.description: Gets or sets date on which it got modified.

parentDefinitionId.description: Gets or sets parent task group Id. This is used while creating a draft task group.

author.description: Sets author name of the task group.

category.description: Sets category of the task group.

description.description: Sets description of the task group.

friendlyName.description: Sets friendly name of the task group.

iconUrl.description: Sets url icon of the task group.

inputs.description: Sets input for the task group.

instanceNameFormat.description: Sets display name of the task group.

name.description: Sets name of the task group.

parentDefinitionId.description: Sets parent task group Id. This is used while creating a draft task group.

runsOn.description: Sets RunsOn of the task group. Value can be 'Agent', 'Server' or 'DeploymentGroup'.

tasks.description: Sets tasks for the task group.

version.description: Sets version of the task group.

disablePriorVersions.description: This is to disable previous versions of task group upon publish

preview.description: Denotes if task group is in preview

revision.description: This is the revision of task group that is getting published

version.description: This is the version of task group that is getting published

restore.description: This is to restore deleted Task Group

TaskGroupStep.description: Represents tasks in the task group.

alwaysRun.description: Gets or sets as 'true' to run the task always, 'false' otherwise.

condition.description: Gets or sets condition for the task.

continueOnError.description: Gets or sets as 'true' to continue on error, 'false' otherwise.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name.

enabled.description: Gets or sets as task is enabled or not.

inputs.description: Gets or sets dictionary of inputs.

retryCountOnTaskFailure.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of retries

task.description: Gets or sets the reference of the task.

timeoutInMinutes.description: Gets or sets the maximum time, in minutes, that a task is allowed to execute on agent before being cancelled by server. A zero value indicates an infinite timeout.

author.description: Sets author name of the task group.

category.description: Sets category of the task group.

comment.description: Sets comment of the task group.

description.description: Sets description of the task group.

friendlyName.description: Sets friendly name of the task group.

iconUrl.description: Sets url icon of the task group.

id.description: Sets the unique identifier of this field.

inputs.description: Sets input for the task group.

instanceNameFormat.description: Sets display name of the task group.

name.description: Sets name of the task group.

parentDefinitionId.description: Gets or sets parent task group Id. This is used while creating a draft task group.

revision.description: Sets revision of the task group.

runsOn.description: Sets RunsOn of the task group. Value can be 'Agent', 'Server' or 'DeploymentGroup'.

tasks.description: Sets tasks for the task group.

version.description: Sets version of the task group.

purchasedHostedLicenseCount.description: Microsoft-hosted licenses purchased from VSTS directly.

purchasedLicenseCount.description: Self-hosted licenses purchased from VSTS directly.

message.description: Message explaining how user can correct if validation fails

TaskLog.description: A task log connected to a timeline record.

createdOn.description: The time of the task log creation.

indexLocation.description: The REST URL of the task log when indexed.

lastChangedOn.description: The time of the last modification of the task log.

lineCount.description: The number of the task log lines.

path.description: The path of the task log.

TaskLogReference.description: A reference to a task log. This class contains information about the output printed to the timeline record's logs console during pipeline run.

id.description: The ID of the task log.

location.description: The REST URL of the task log.

type.description: Gets the name of the package.

url.description: Gets the url of the package.

version.description: Gets the version of the package.

buildConfig.description:
The build config of the task definition. Corresponds to the version value of task.json file.
Example: CmdLineV2 { "_buildConfigMapping": { "Default": "2.232.2", "Node20_229_7": "2.232.3" } }

id.description:
The ID of the task definition. Corresponds to the id value of task.json file.
Example: CmdLineV2 { "id": "D9BAFED4-0B18-4F58-968D-86655B4D2CE9" }

inputs.description: A dictionary of inputs specific to a task definition. Corresponds to inputs value of task.json file.

name.description:
The name of the task definition. Corresponds to the name value of task.json file.
Example: CmdLineV2 { "name": "CmdLine" }

version.description:
The version of the task definition. Corresponds to the version value of task.json file.
Example: CmdLineV2 { "version": { "Major": 2, "Minor": 212, "Patch": 0 } }

ordinal.description: The ordinal number of a release within the selected sprint.

sprint.description: The Azure DevOps sprint the release belongs to.

TimelineAttempt.description: An attempt to update a TimelineRecord.

identifier.description: The unique identifier for the record.

recordId.description: The record identifier located within the specified timeline.

timelineId.description: The timeline identifier which owns the record representing this attempt.

TimelineRecord.description: Detailed information about the execution of different operations during pipeline run.

agentSpecification.description:
The specification of an agent running a pipeline job, in binary format. Applicable when record is of type Job.
Example: { "VMImage" : "windows-2019" }

changeId.description: The ID connecting all records updated at the same time. This value is taken from timeline's ChangeId.

currentOperation.description: A string that indicates the current operation.

errorCount.description: The number of errors produced by this operation.

finishTime.description: The finish time of the record.

identifier.description: String identifier that is consistent across attempts.

issues.description: The list of issues produced by this operation.

lastModified.description: The time the record was last modified.

location.description: The REST URL of the record.

log.description: A reference to the log produced by this operation.

name.description: The name of the record.

order.description: An ordinal value relative to other records within the timeline.

parentId.description:
The ID of the record's parent.
Example: Stage is a parent of a Phase, Phase is a parent of a Job, Job is a parent of a Task.

queueId.description: The ID of the queue which connects projects to agent pools on which the operation ran on. Applicable when record is of type Job.

resultCode.description:
Evaluation of predefined conditions upon completion of record's operation.
Example: Evaluating `succeeded()`, Result = True
Example: Evaluating `and(succeeded(), eq(variables['system.debug'], False))`, Result = False

startTime.description: The start time of the record.

task.description: A reference to the task. Applicable when record is of type Task.

type.description:
The type of operation being tracked by the record.
Example: Stage, Phase, Job, Task...

warningCount.description: The number of warnings produced by this operation.

workerName.description: The name of the agent running the operation. Applicable when record is of type Job.

TimelineRecordReference.description: A reference to a timeline record.

identifier.description: String identifier that is consistent across attempts.

location.description: The REST URL of the timeline.

isValid.description: Tells whether the current input is valid or not

value.description: Value to validate. The conditional expression to validate for the input for "expression" type Eg:eq(variables['Build.SourceBranch'], 'refs/heads/master');eq(value, 'refs/heads/master')

VariableGroup.description: A variable group is a collection of related variables.

createdBy.description: Gets or sets the identity who created the variable group.

createdOn.description: Gets or sets the time when variable group was created.

description.description: Gets or sets description of the variable group.

id.description: Gets or sets id of the variable group.

isShared.description: Indicates whether variable group is shared with other projects or not.

modifiedBy.description: Gets or sets the identity who modified the variable group.

modifiedOn.description: Gets or sets the time when variable group was modified

name.description: Gets or sets name of the variable group.

type.description: Gets or sets type of the variable group.

variableGroupProjectReferences.description: all project references where the variable group is shared with other projects.

variables.description: Gets or sets variables contained in the variable group.

description.description: Sets description of the variable group.

name.description: Sets name of the variable group.

type.description: Sets type of the variable group.

variables.description: Sets variables contained in the variable group.

VariableGroupProjectReference.description: A variable group reference is a shallow reference to variable group.

description.description: Gets or sets description of the variable group.

name.description: Gets or sets name of the variable group.

projectReference.description: Gets or sets project reference of the variable group.

VariableGroupProviderData.description: Defines provider data of the variable group.

VariableValue.description: A wrapper class for a generic variable.

isReadOnly.description: Indicates whether the variable can be changed during script's execution runtime.

isSecret.description: Indicates whether the variable should be encrypted at rest.

VssJsonCollectionWrapper.description: This class is used to serialize collections as a single JSON object on the wire.

YamlCheckReference.description: Represents a reference to a check configuration defined in pipeline YAML. Persisted stage is the resource that contains the check configuration reference.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the check configuration reference.

api-Version-preview.1.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.1.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.1' to use this version of the api.

api-Version-preview.2.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.2.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.2' to use this version of the api.

api-Version-preview.3.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.3.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.3' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

scopes.vso.agentpools: Grants the ability to view tasks, pools, queues, agents, and currently running or recently completed jobs for agents
scopes.vso.agentpools_manage: Grants the ability to manage pools, queues, and agents
scopes.vso.machinegroup_manage: Provides ability to manage deployment group and agent pools
scopes.vso.taskgroups_manage: Grants the ability to read, create and manage taskgroups.
scopes.vso.taskgroups_read: Grants the ability to read task groups
scopes.vso.taskgroups_write: Grants the ability to read and create task groups
scopes.vso.variablegroups_read: Grants the ability to read variable groups
scopes.vso.variablegroups_manage: Grants the ability to read, create and manage variablegroups.
scopes.vso.securefiles_write: Grants the ability to read and create secure files.
scopes.vso.securefiles_read: Grants the ability to read secure files.
scopes.vso.securefiles_manage: Grants the ability to read, create, and manage secure files.
